name: PIC-O-SKETCH
description:
Hey, if you're bored of doing what you're doing then here's something to waste your time!

PIC-O-SKETCH  is the brand new app that lets you draw in one continuous line and doesn't let you erase what you've done - unless you erase the whole thing! 

This is a life lesson where you must either tear down everything you've worked towards, or learn to live with your mistakes! 

And it has 5 different colour schemes!!!


-- Game & Controls -- 

On main menu - 
Directional keys & X - choose colour scheme to draw with
Z - start drawing

In game - 
Directional keys  - move to draw
Z - clear the screen and start your drawing again
X - reset back to main menu


--Reviews--

"Phew, I'm sure glad that this isn't infringing on any other existing products or brands trademarks" - Bobu, 2021


--Dev notes--

When I started trying out pico-8 last year, @andrewedstrom pointed out that what I was doing looked like an etch-a-sketch - so I made this.

That's the story, the end.
